channel.title: Posts on John's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on John's Blog

item.title: New Blog
item.description: I’m excited to set up my new blog! I plan to post stuff I’m learning that I find cool. Some topics I have in mind are functional programming, becoming more proficient in Python, and reading Mostly Harmless Economics I give special thanks to … Yihue Xi for the excellent Blogdown package, Nan Xiao for the cool looking Hugo theme, and Tyler Clavelle for the walkthrough helping me to set up my blog.
